headline: Whoa there, Speedy Gonzales!
intro: Looks like your mouse was heading for a distraction fiesta! Let's steer back to the productivity ranch.
actionPrompt: Quick, before the procrastination monster wakes up, try one of these:
funnyTips: Micro-Nap: Close your eyes for 60 seconds. Set a tiny alarm if you might accidentally nap for an hour.
Hydration Hero: Chug a glass of water like you've just crossed a desert to find this very webpage.
Window Gaze: Look out the window and find the weirdest cloud. Give it a name.

headline: Not so fast, Keyboard Maverick!
intro: You've stumbled upon the focus zone checkpoint. This site is currently on a coffee break. And maybe you should take one too (a short one!).
actionPrompt: Consider these maneuvers to get back on course:
funnyTips: Stretch Armstrong: Pretend your arms are noodles and then stretch them as far as they can go.
Desk Safari: Spot 5 things on your desk you haven't noticed before. Marvel at their existence.
Silent Scream: If you need to, do it. Into a pillow. Soundlessly.

headline: Alert! Productivity Field Activated!
intro: This website is temporarily off-limits by order of the 'Get Stuff Done' council. Don't worry, it's for your own good!
actionPrompt: To re-engage your awesome brainpower, how about:
funnyTips: Tell a Secret: Whisper your biggest work goal to your coffee mug. It's sworn to secrecy.
Count Backwards: From 10. Slowly. Like a rocket launch, but for focus.
Shoulder Shrugs: Release that tension! 5 shrugs up to your ears, then relax.

headline: Oops! Did your focus just take a detour?
intro: It seems you were about to dive into a rabbit hole. Let's climb back out and get back to conquering your tasks!
actionPrompt: Try these detours back to a productive mindset:
funnyTips: The Refocus Pose: Stand like a superhero for 30 seconds. Cape optional but encouraged.
Mental Switch: Think of your brain as a computer. You just closed an app. Now open the 'Work' app.
Sniff Something Nice: A calming scent like lavender, or the smell of an old book. Or coffee. Always coffee.

headline: LEVEL UP YOUR FOCUS!
intro: Woah, looks like you took a wrong warp pipe into the Distraction Zone! Let's get you back to the main quest.
actionPrompt: Press START on one of these power-ups:
funnyTips: Save Point: Write down what you were *just* about to do. Phew, progress saved!
Boss Battle Prep: Tackle the smallest, easiest part of your task. Build that XP!
Health Potion: Drink some water. Low HP is bad for focus.

headline: Case of the Wandering Mind: SOLVED!
intro: Aha! We've found the culprit: a sneaky link trying to lead your attention astray. Elementary, my dear Watson!
actionPrompt: Here are some clues to get back on the case:
funnyTips: Dust for Prints: Briefly review your notes or goals. What's the next lead?
Interrogate a Rubber Duck: Explain your task out loud. You might uncover a breakthrough!
Stakeout (Mini): Observe your surroundings for 1 minute. What's *not* a distraction?

headline: Houston, We Have a... Distraction!
intro: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, was focus. Looks like you veered off into an asteroid field of diversions!
actionPrompt: Re-engage thrusters with these coordinates:
funnyTips: Pre-Flight Checklist: What's the #1 thing you need to launch next?
Engage Warp Speed (for 5 mins): Hyperfocus on one task. No space debris allowed!
Oxygen Break: Step away, take 3 deep breaths. Refuel your brain tank.

headline: Too Many Cooks in the Browser!
intro: Whoops! Looks like you almost added a dash of distraction to your recipe for success. Let's get back to the main course!
actionPrompt: Here's the secret sauce for regaining focus:
funnyTips: Mise en Place: Get your mental ingredients ready. What's the next step?
Simmer Down: Take a brief pause, like letting a good stew rest.
Taste Test: Review your last completed task. What worked well?

headline: Don't Feed the Distractions!
intro: Looks like a wild distraction appeared! They can be cute, but they'll eat your precious time. Let's gently guide it back to the wilderness.
actionPrompt: Follow these nature trails back to productivity:
funnyTips: Be a Wise Owl: What's the wisest thing to do right now?
The Early Bird Gets the Worm: Tackle one small task immediately.
Like a Bee to Honey: Focus on the sweetest part of your work (or the part that gets it done).

headline: Your Focus Signal is On!
intro: A citizen of your to-do list is in distress! It seems a villainous distraction nearly lured you away. To the Productiv-mobile!
actionPrompt: Activate your superpowers with these focus-enhancing gadgets:
funnyTips: Identify Your Kryptonite: What's *really* distracting you? Neutralize it!
X-Ray Vision: Look through the clutter and see your main goal.
Super Speed (for 1 task): Try to complete one very small task as fast as you can.

headline: Shiver Me Timbers! Off Course!
intro: Avast ye! Looks like ye were sailin' straight into the Sea of Lost Time! Let's get this ship back on course for Treasure Island (of Accomplishments)!
actionPrompt: Heave ho with these here instructions, matey:
funnyTips: Consult the Map: Your to-do list is your treasure map. Where X marks the spot?
Hoist the Main Sail: Pick your main task and give it all ye got!
Swab the Deck: Clear your mental (or actual) workspace a bit.

headline: Focus Pocus, Where'd It Go-cus?
intro: By Merlin's beard! A mischievous sprite of distraction tried to cast a spell on you! Time for some counter-magic.
actionPrompt: Recite these ancient enchantments for clarity:
funnyTips: Summon Your Familiar: (A pen & paper). Jot down the next step.
Scrying Orb (Water Glass): Gaze into it thoughtfully for 30 seconds. Then drink it.
Invisibility Charm: Make distracting sites disappear (close tabs).

headline: LOGIC ERROR: Focus Module Offline!
intro: Bzzzt! Your programming seems to have encountered an unscheduled detour subroutine. Recalibrating for optimal task completion.
actionPrompt: Initiate these diagnostic protocols:
funnyTips: Reboot Sequence: Stand up, turn around, sit down. System restarted.
Scan for Malware: What thought-viruses are slowing you down?
Run `defrag_brain.exe`: Take 5 deep breaths to clear mental cache.

headline: HARD HAT AREA: Focus Under Construction!
intro: Hold up there, partner! Looks like you were about to drive your productivity bulldozer into a ditch of distractions. Let's get back to building something great!
actionPrompt: Grab your tools and these blueprints for success:
funnyTips: Check the Foundation: What's the most important task holding everything up?
Lay One Brick: Do one small, concrete action towards your goal.
Safety Break: A quick 2-minute stretch. Safety first!

headline: Greetings Earthling! Lost Your Focus Beam?
intro: It appears your tractor beam of attention was momentarily diverted by an unidentified flying object of distraction. We come in peace... to bring you back to your mission.
actionPrompt: Use these advanced alien techniques to re-engage:
funnyTips: Mind Meld with Your Task: Try to understand it from a new perspective.
Activate Hyperdrive (for 10 mins): Intense focus, no incoming transmissions!
Analyze Earthling Distraction Patterns: What usually throws you off? Avoid it!

headline: Wakey Wakey, Brain Cells!
intro: Oh dear, did your focus just doze off and dream of other websites? Let's gently nudge it awake before it starts snoring.
actionPrompt: Try these gentle alarm clocks for your attention:
funnyTips: Pillow Talk (with your To-Do List): Whisper your next task to it. It's less intimidating that way.
Stretch Like a Cat: A big, luxurious stretch to get the blood flowing.
Splash of Cold Water (Metaphorical): A quick glance at your deadline!

headline: Great Scott! You've Distracted the Timeline!
intro: By veering off course, you nearly created a paradox where your work doesn't get done! We must return to the correct point in your productivity continuum.
actionPrompt: Synchronize your watches and follow these temporal directives:
funnyTips: Check Your Flux Capacitor (Brain): Is it charged and ready for focused work?
Return to a Key Moment: What were you *just* about to do before the temporal anomaly?
Avoid Butterfly Effects: Small distractions can have big consequences. Stay on target!

headline: Eureka! I've Found... a Distraction!
intro: My hypothesis was that you'd stay focused, but this new variable (a tempting website) has skewed the results! Back to the laboratory of productivity!
actionPrompt: Conduct these experiments in concentration:
funnyTips: Formulate a Hypothesis: 'If I focus for 10 minutes, I will achieve X.'
Isolate the Variable: Close all other tabs and apps. Only the experiment matters.
Observe and Record: How does it feel to make progress? Note for future experiments.

headline: Lost the Tempo? Let's Get Back in Rhythm!
intro: Whoa, it looks like your focus went off-key and was about to join a different band called 'The Procrastinators'. Time for a soundcheck!
actionPrompt: Tune up your concentration with these riffs:
funnyTips: Find Your Key Signature: What's the most important note (task) to hit right now?
Practice Your Scales (Small Steps): Warm up with an easy part of your task.
Silent Rehearsal: Mentally walk through what you need to do.

headline: Hold Your Horses, Web Wanderer!
intro: Looks like your cursor was about to gallop off into the sunset of distraction. Let's rein it in and get back to the task corral!
actionPrompt: Try these rodeo tricks to wrangle your focus:
funnyTips: Quick Lasso: Snag your most immediate task and pull it closer.
Trail Boss Tip: Identify the next waypoint on your project map.
Watering Hole Break: Take a quick sip of water – keep that brain hydrated!

headline: Attention! Focus Drill Sergeant On Deck!
intro: Your concentration was about to go AWOL! Time for some mental push-ups to get back in fighting shape.
actionPrompt: Drop and give me 20... seconds of focus with these drills:
funnyTips: At Ease, Browser: Close unnecessary tabs. Stand down, distractions!
Forward March (on your task list): Pick one objective and advance.
Ten-Hut (for Ten Breaths): Focus on your breathing. Inhale discipline, exhale chaos.

headline: Danger, Will Robinson! Distraction Approaching!
intro: Your internal sensors detected a deviation from the path of productivity. Recalibrating trajectory immediately!
actionPrompt: Activate these emergency protocols:
funnyTips: Shields Up!: Minimize distracting applications.
Course Correction: Glance at your to-do list and select the next nav point.
Life Support Check (Hydration): Drink a glass of water.

headline: This Page is Guarded by a Focus Dragon!
intro: ROAR! You were about to wander into the lair of procrastination. I am here to protect your precious hoard of productivity!
actionPrompt: Offer one of these tributes to the Focus Dragon:
funnyTips: Polish a Gem: Work on one small, shiny part of your task.
Count Your Gold: Review what you've already accomplished today.
Sharpen Your Claws: Prepare your tools (software, notes) for the next assault on your to-do list.

headline: Red Alert! Distraction Incursion!
intro: Captain, the ship's focus shields are down! We've detected an unauthorized entry into the Procrastination Quadrant. All hands to battle stations!
actionPrompt: Execute these tactical maneuvers:
funnyTips: Evasive Maneuvers: Close the distracting tab or window NOW!
Set Phasers to Stunning (Focus): Pick one task and give it your undivided attention.
Damage Report: Quick! What were you *just* working on?

headline: The Focus Librarian Says 'Shhh!'
intro: It appears you were about to make some noise in the quiet zone of productivity. Let's find our way back to the silent study hall of getting things done.
actionPrompt: Please observe these library rules for concentration:
funnyTips: Return Your Overdue Tasks: Pick one small thing and complete it.
Consult the Card Catalog (Your To-Do List): What subject are you researching next?
Find a Quiet Nook: Minimize external noise and visual distractions.

headline: Mamma Mia! Wrong Recipe, Friend-o!
intro: Ey, you almost-a click on the wrong-a ingredient! We make-a the productivity, not the procrastination pasta!
actionPrompt: Let's-a get back to cooking success, yes?
funnyTips: Check-a Your Menu: What's the special today? Focus on that one dish.
Prep Your Station: Clear the clutter like you're prepping for the dinner rush.
Kiss the Chef: Give yourself a compliment for catching that distraction!

headline: Beep Boop! Productivity Bot Activated!
intro: WARNING: Distraction detected in sector 7G. Deploying counter-measures to restore optimal workflow.
actionPrompt: Running focus restoration protocols:
funnyTips: Memory Bank Scan: What task did you schedule for this time slot?
Clear Temp Files: Close everything not related to your current objective.
Battery Check: Are you running low on energy? Quick snack or water break!

headline: Whoa There, Speed Racer!
intro: Your focus mobile was about to veer off the productivity track! Let's get you back in the race.
actionPrompt: Pit stop procedures for peak performance:
funnyTips: Check Your Fuel: Are you tired? A quick break might help you finish faster.
Review the Track: Look at your to-do list and pick the next checkpoint.
Green Flag Mindset: You're back in the race! Hit the gas on one task.

headline: Knightly Quest Interrupted!
intro: Halt, brave warrior! A digital dragon tried to lure you from your noble quest. Let us return to vanquishing thy tasks!
actionPrompt: Arm thyself with these honorable tactics:
funnyTips: Consult Thy Quest Log: What challenge awaits completion?
Sharpen Thy Blade: Prepare thy tools and focus thy mind.
Battle Cry: Declare aloud what you will accomplish next!

headline: The Focus Gardener Has Arrived!
intro: Looks like some weeds of distraction tried to grow in your productivity garden. Time to tend to what matters!
actionPrompt: Cultivate your concentration with these green-thumb tips:
funnyTips: Pull the Weeds: Close distracting tabs and apps immediately.
Water Your Goals: Give attention to the most important task right now.
Watch It Grow: Spend just 5 minutes on your task and see progress bloom.

headline: DJ Focus in the House!
intro: Yo yo yo! Your productivity track was about to get scratched by a distraction remix. Let's drop the beat back to work mode!
actionPrompt: Spin these tracks to get back in the groove:
funnyTips: Drop the Bass (Line Task): What's the foundation? Start there.
Mix It Up: If you're stuck, switch to a different part of the same project.
Volume Check: Silence notifications. Only your work gets airtime now.

headline: Circus Ringmaster Says: Back to Center Ring!
intro: Ladies and gentlemen! Our daring performer almost wandered into the sideshow tent! Let's return to the main attraction: your productivity!
actionPrompt: Step right up and try these amazing feats:
funnyTips: The Balancing Act: What's the one task that everything else depends on?
Juggle Less: Focus on catching just one ball at a time.
The Grand Finale: Visualize completing your task. The crowd goes wild!

headline: Weather Alert: Distraction Storm Passing!
intro: Good news! The forecast shows clearing skies ahead. Let's navigate back to sunny productivity conditions.
actionPrompt: Follow this meteorological guidance:
funnyTips: Check the Radar: What tasks are on the horizon?
Batten Down the Hatches: Secure your focus by eliminating distractions.
Eye of the Storm: Find your calm center and work from there.

headline: Architect's Blueprint: Focus Foundation Needed!
intro: Your productivity structure needs attention! A distraction tried to compromise the design. Let's reinforce those foundations.
actionPrompt: Review these structural improvements:
funnyTips: Load-Bearing Wall: Identify the most critical task supporting everything else.
Inspect the Site: Clear away debris (close unnecessary apps/tabs).
Follow the Blueprint: Stick to your plan for the next 15 minutes.

headline: Submarine Diving! Focus Depth Achieved!
intro: Dive dive dive! We're going deep into productive waters, away from the surface distractions.
actionPrompt: Engage these underwater operations:
funnyTips: Periscope Up: Take a quick look at your main objective.
Silent Running: Mute all notifications for deep focus.
Torpedo Launch: Fire off one completed task. Direct hit!
